name: Maduro Magnum
additionalNotes:
The Crossfire Maduro is a sophisticated and unique cigar. Rolled in the Dominican Republic, this cigar features rich binder and filler from its homeland. The cigar features a lightly fermented shade grown maduro wrapper made with an Ecuadorian Habana leaf. With this careful aging process, you experience a mild sweetness you expect with the maduro process without the dark, traditional look. A medium to full bodied cigar, it begins with a rich and smooth taste and transitions in strength and complexity. Loaded with rich flavors of earth and toasted almonds this cigar has a smooth draw and white ash that make this a pleasure to smoke.
crossfirecigars.com
